summary: This is the Crimson Twilight armor :) I know there is a black texture version as well as the original red but i did a lighter red, Darker boots and HDT for boob and butt bounce. Hope you enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
This is the Crimson Twilight armor :) I know there is a black texture version as well as the original red but i did a lighter red, Darker boots and HDT for boob and butt bounce. Hope you enjoy!
Please let me know what you think !


Original is byÂ  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2509011]jmenaru[/url] & can be found by clicking [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59399/?]HERE :D
[/url]


Required mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics



You NEED the "ebony smithing" perk for it to appear in your forge menu and to craft it.
[/url]
author: Danikitty
